basics.name: Hillary Zelasko
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a A.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at Sullivan University. I expect to graduate in December, 2023.

highlights: Provide non-clinical support for the policies and procedures ensuring the best and most appropriate treatment, care, or services for members in a healthcare setting.
Created an Excel spreadsheet to maintain and review logistical data through pivot tables and charts regarding home health authorizations.
Responsible for resourcing, staffing and scheduling jobs and projects for clients.
Introduced and maintained a Work in Progress report to keep projects running smoothly via Microsoft Excel data analysis.
Maintained accounts totaling $600,000 per year by creating professional relationships and guaranteeing we meet their needs.
Verified every order which reduced clerical and pricing errors by 90%.
Maintained the Work in Progress report via Microsoft Excel Data Analysis.
Promoted to work with the Mass Update Project Team to update mass amounts of data, quickly and accurately via automated programming.
Advanced my knowledge of Microsoft Excel and Access SQL to create queries to analyze and/or add data to existing tables.
Data Entry - Keyed over 80 WPM with 98% accuracy of Credit Card Applications.
Worked closely with the reporting team on a new project called the Work in Progress.  By doing this we were able to reduce SLA times drastically.
Subject Matter Expert (S.M.E.) - assisted in the release of a new database.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: 3.5 - 4.0 GPA Award for Full Time Students.
